title: Looking for Club members
body:
Looking to start a dweeby ~~loser~~ club for people, focussed less around winning and more about enjoying the game and exploring some of the finer aspects of the game, (like AD top lane Leona).

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

I only ask a few things of people before joining-
Be kind.
Be nice.
Don't flame.

And most importantly:
Aim to create a better league community for everyone involved.
****
Feel free to add me in your client if you're interested
